statements: UPSERT INTO sustainability_data (id, location, temperature, humidity, carbon_dioxide_level) VALUES (1, 'Office', 22.5, 50.3, 400.0);
UPSERT INTO sustainability_data (id, location, temperature, humidity, carbon_dioxide_level) VALUES (2, 'Home', 21.8, 60.2, 450.5);
UPSERT INTO sustainability_data (id, location, temperature, humidity, carbon_dioxide_level) VALUES (3, 'Factory', 28.3, 40.1, 600.7);

UPSERT INTO environmental_impact (id, category, description, impact_score) VALUES (1, 'Energy', 'Reduce energy consumption by 20%', 80) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE category = VALUES(category), description = VALUES(description), impact_score = VALUES(impact_score);

UPSERT INTO sustainability_actions (id, action_name, description, impact_reduction) VALUES (1, 'Use recyclable materials', 'Promote the use of recyclable materials in production', 30) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE action_name = VALUES(action_name), description = VALUES(description), impact_reduction = VALUES(impact_reduction);

UPSERT INTO environmental_impact (id, category, description, impact_score) VALUES (2, 'Waste Management', 'Implement waste recycling program', 60) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE category = VALUES(category), description = VALUES(description), impact_score = VALUES(impact_score);

UPSERT INTO environmental_impact (id, category, description, carbon_footprint, energy_consumption) VALUES (1, 'Transportation', 'Reduce emissions from transportation', 30.5, 250.3) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET category = EXCLUDED.category, description = EXCLUDED.description, carbon_footprint = EXCLUDED.carbon_footprint, energy_consumption = EXCLUDED.energy_consumption

UPSERT INTO sustainability_goals (id, goal, target, progress) VALUES (1, 'Reduce carbon footprint by 20%', 'Achieve a 20% reduction in carbon footprint by 2025', 15.2) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET goal = EXCLUDED.goal, target = EXCLUDED.target, progress = EXCLUDED.progress

UPSERT INTO sustainability_actions (id, action, impact, effectiveness) VALUES (1, 'Promote recycling program', 'Increase recycling rates and reduce waste', 80.7) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET action = EXCLUDED.action, impact = EXCLUDED.impact, effectiveness = EXCLUDED.effectiveness

UPSERT INTO carbon_footprint (id, company_name, emission_level) VALUES ('e48f310d-d0b8-4daf-b329-0b2278bba5d3', 'Company A', 25.5) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET company_name = excluded.company_name, emission_level = excluded.emission_level;

UPSERT INTO energy_consumption (id, device_id, consumption, timestamp) VALUES ('2dbe9cc8-4c8a-4f54-a3d9-e25e7d759ad2', '23aa7f10-0bc4-4cf5-9ec3-43d7a44fb89f', 100.25, '2022-10-05 08:00:00') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET device_id = excluded.device_id, consumption = excluded.consumption, timestamp = excluded.timestamp;

UPSERT INTO waste_management (id, company_name, waste_type, weight) VALUES ('066db144-268f-4f0f-b06f-58fcf64771dc', 'Company B', 'Plastic', 50.75) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET company_name = excluded.company_name, waste_type = excluded.waste_type, weight = excluded.weight;

UPSERT INTO environmental_impact (id, name, description, impact_type) VALUES (1, 'Climate Change', 'Description of climate change impact', 'Environmental'), ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name=EXCLUDED.name, description=EXCLUDED.description, impact_type=EXCLUDED.impact_type

UPSERT INTO sustainability_goals (id, goal_name, target, completion_date) VALUES (1, 'Reduce Carbon Footprint', '20%', '2025-12-31'), ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET goal_name=EXCLUDED.goal_name, target=EXCLUDED.target, completion_date=EXCLUDED.completion_date

UPSERT INTO sustainability_initiatives (id, initiative_name, description, start_date, end_date) VALUES (1, 'Green Energy Plan', 'Description of green energy initiative', '2022-01-01', '2025-12-31'), ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET initiative_name=EXCLUDED.initiative_name, description=EXCLUDED.description, start_date=EXCLUDED.start_date, end_date=EXCLUDED.end_date
